verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. If <WH3884> it had not been Jehovah <WH3068> who was on our side <WH3478>, Let Israel now say <WH559>,
If <WH3884> it had not been Jehovah <WH3068> who was on our side <WH120>, When men rose up against us <WH6965>;
Then <WH233> they had swallowed us up <WH1104> alive <WH2416>, When their wrath <WH639> was kindled against us <WH2734>;
Then <WH233> the waters <WH4325> had overwhelmed <WH7857> us <WH5158>, The stream had gone over <WH5674> our soul <WH5315>;
Then <WH233> the proud <WH2121> waters <WH4325> had gone over <WH5674> our soul <WH5315>.
Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah <WH3068>, Who hath not given <WH5414> us as a prey <WH2964> to their teeth <WH8127>.
Our soul <WH5315> is escaped <WH4422> as a bird <WH6833> out of the snare <WH6341> of the fowlers <WH3369>: The snare <WH6341> is broken <WH7665>, and we are escaped <WH4422>.
Our help <WH5828> is in the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>, Who made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>.
